EDUCATOR

Taylor has been featured in How-To videos for Total Beauty

Taylor has taught Master Classes for Shiseido, Lancôme, at the Dermatology Convention

Taylor is a two time IMATS Educator

Taylor has toured the country doing store appearances at Saks Fifth Avenue, Bloomingdales,
Nordstrom, Macy’s and independent retailers in such cities as New York, Boston, San Francisco,
Dallas, Houston, Honolulu, and in the Los Angeles area.
